lines.text: Well you know what they always say my man, "He who lives by the sword shall die by the sword".
Don't let the door hit you on the ass on the way out, huh.
Something wrong?
No, I keep getting the feeling I know you from somewhere.
I'm just trying to tell you something. I'm trying to tell you there's a telephone. I pick it up and I dial it.
Jay Jay, why don't you go cruise some sailors, huh?
Oh please, don't mention seafood.
Why didn't you take my call?
Where does it say that I gotta drop what I'm doing and answer the phone every time it rings?
Do you know your nostrils flare out into little wings when you're mad? It's kinda cute.
God, you're dumb.
Why don't you play some Montovani sometime?
Didn't know you liked the show.
I don't. I like Montovani.
Hello?
Garver!
Yeah.
Sgt McCallum. Sorry to wake you but something has come up.
Yeah I know, she just paid me a visit with a butcher knife.
Why? Because she was released on parole pending further legal action.
When?
A week ago.
Well I sure like the way you broke your ass to let me know about it!
I just found out about it myself.
Who's in charge down there anyway?
Now look you wanna help find her or would you rather just sit there and belly-ache?
All right.
Now exactly what did she say to you?
I told you, she said that she was well and that she was going to Hawaii.
Uh what else?
I already told you.
Well tell me again.
You know Sergeant, you really make lousy conversation!
You make lousy coffee!
All right, I think I will go out and hit the streets but before doing that I will blow me a little number.
Take it in the other room, will ya - get zonked just breathing the air in here.
Al, you ever find yourself being completely smothered by somebody?
Anybody I know?
Yeah, you met her at my house the other day.
Ooooo - chicken delight! Well that's what I call some pretty good smotherin' cousin.
That's right, you assumed wrong.
I should've known you'd never do anything to spoil it.
To spoil what?
What we have between us.
We don't have a goddam thing between us.
You haven't got the faintest idea of what love is, we don't even know each other.
Don't you like me?
You're a nice girl.
But who needs nice girls?
I'm kind of hung up on one.
And you don't want to complicate your life.
That's exactly right.
Well neither do I, but that's no reason we shouldn't sleep together tonight if we feel like it.
Its nothing personal, I just happen to think she could be a first rate artist if her damn hormones didn't keep getting in the way.
There's a little spot in the middle of each day about your size.
Well there's lots of girls about my size if you're really looking.
I'm not, that's what I'm trying to tell you.
You mean you've given up girls?
Well I haven't exactly been the monk of the month or anything like that but I have been making an effort.
It was funny, I was calling you from that phone booth over there and he was telling me you'd left and I was staring at your car - isn't that funny.
Kind of funny.
Care for a beer?
Not really, I'd go for something more uplifting but not a brew, David, not a brew my man.
Never let it be said that sweet Al Monte can't take a hint.
Who's hinting?
Well you shouldn't lend your sweaters to blabbermouths.
You told me you didn't know where she was.
So I lied - picket me.
I really missed this place.
I missed you.
You'd do me a big favour if you didn't say things like that.
Oh I didn't wish you anything too serious, just a couple of months in traction.
You're all heart.
I was starting to be one of my most unfavourite people.

[as a passer-by]
Having some trouble, lady?
Get lost!
Yeah, get lost, assholes!
I did it because I LOVE YOU!
People trying to sleep here!
People trying to talk here!
How'd you like to tell that to the law?
How'd you like to go screw yourself?
I oughta be mad!
Careful! I might put your eye out.
The whole point of having an answering service is to call them once in a while and see if you've got any messages.
Girl thinks you've been working too hard, man. She says we should get together and go out tonight, blast the town open a little taste.
That bitch should be hung by the thumbs or something equally appropriate.
It's going to cost you double to clean up this mess.

[menacing Tobie with a pair of hair-scissors]
I hope Dave likes what he sees when he gets here. Because that's what he's taking to Hell with him!
Is she your house cleaning lady, Garver?
